description:
Gladiator representing Nishihonji Security Services.
The youngest gladiator in Kengan history made his debut at age 14 and remains undefeated after 21 battles. Trained in jujutsu, "The King of Stranglers" employs various stranglehold techniques to defeat his opponent. Otherwise, a friendly, communicative sort with friends both in and outside the Kengan world.
Source: Official site
name: Imai Cosmo
